text: David Owen Murray was an Anglican bishop in the late 20th and early 21st centuries.Perth Cathedral Murray trained for the priesthood at the Australian College of Theology and was ordained in 1969. His first post was at St Boniface's Cathedral, Bunbury. He then served at Lake Grace, Jerramungup and Mount Barker.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1980-82 p 721 London: Oxford University Press, 1983 He was Bishop of the Southern Region of the Anglican Diocese of Perth from 1991 until 2006. ==References== Category:Australian College of Theology alumni Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:21st-century Anglican bishops Category:Anglican Diocese of Perth Category:Living people Category:Assistant bishops in the Anglican Diocese of Perth Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: David Murray (bishop)
